review_body: Room 304. I'll get right to the issue I had: the water in the shower and the sink (both Hot and Cold) became scaldingly Hot. I was taking a shower and everything was fine but then the water became too hot. I tried to adjust it but it didn't become cool or cold. Just very hot. And I mean dangerously hot. Ok. Not great but I was able to sponge off the soap and figured I could wash my hair in the sink. Nope. The water coming out of the faucet was also only Hot. No cold. I called Front Desk from the hotel phone. Got connected to an operator named "Maria". She said an engineer would be up shortly. Called at 8AM and by 8:30AM, no one had come. So I dressed and went to check out. Front Desk person really didn't seem to take me seriously. Offered zero compensation. But he did say "Have a nice day." Very frustrating.

Great location, you can walk to time square in 5 mins, MSG in 10 mins and there is a subway nearby for anything else.Down side is that sheets were grubby and tatty and curtains wouldn't shut due to air con being in the way.

Pros - Location location location - Clean Rooms- Friendly staff Cons- 2 lifts 1 which wasn’t working, there were really long wait time for lifts - fine if on lower floors can use the stairs - Breakfast was so busy and overcrowded, mediocre food. - Average sleep, first night our alarm went off at 6am (i’m sure this was an accident) second night some random guy banging on our door for 10 minutes at 4am (again not hotels fault) Overall great location would be the main reason to stay here!
